job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Retail,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Peachy is seeking a Software Engineer to join the team! Peachy is a fast-growing, wrinkle prevention brand based in New York City. We offer the three scientifically demonstrated ways to prevent and treat facial wrinkles in our studios. It's our mission to make wrinkle prevention and treatment approachable, but also clinically excellent.We are looking for a Software Engineer that is excited about building a technology infrastructure to scale with a growing business. This opportunity will report directly to our Engineering Lead, and will be an instrumental hire to expand our Technology department. What You'll Do Develop, test, deploy and manage scalable technology applications (Peachy studio app, photo booth, and website)Collaborate with UX designer on Peachy studio app layout modificationsCreate and instill engineering best practices, drive adoption in code health, testing, and maintainabilityContribute to the full stack, from backend APIs to front end-user interfaces, to deliver end-to-end solutionsIdentify business needs, contribute to technical strategy, and create technology roadmaps and documentationDesign frameworks to ingest data from our customer journeyImprove existing technology infrastructure, and workflow challenges through recommended process improvement solutions Who You Are BS in Computer Science or a related field2+ years of experience preferredFamiliarity with open-source technologiesProficiency with HTML and CSS, or JavascriptExperience in any front end framework such as React/Redux, Angular, Vue, SvelteKnowledge of HTTP protocols, developer tools, SSL certificates and web application architectureExperience with distributed systemsComfortable working with cloud servicesA strong understanding of, and practical experience with, web application development.Excited about the opportunity to act autonomously, manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverablesExperience writing understandable, testable, efficient codeAbility to collaborate cross-functionally and excellent communication skillsAn understanding of modern design patterns and proven experience applying themPay & Perks:Health & Wellness perksCompetitive compensationComplimentary Peachy services and productsThe opportunity to join a high-growth company at an early stageThe ability to impact the growth of the company, we value employee feedback & suggestions!Peachy is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant or employee because of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability,
